info.name: BizzWeb E-commerce API
info.description: Complete API collection for BizzWeb multi-store e-commerce platform

body.raw:
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "comment": "Great products and excellent service!",
  "rating": 5,
  "image": "https://example.com/john.jpg",
  "designation": "Happy Customer"
}

{
  "name": "New Store",
  "description": "A new e-commerce store",
  "domain": "newstore.example.com",
  "owner_id": "{{user_id}}",
  "category_id": "{{category_id}}",
  "contact_email": "owner@newstore.com",
  "contact_phone": "+1234567890",
  "address": {
    "street": "123 Business St",
    "city": "Business City",
    "state": "BC",
    "zip_code": "12345",
    "country": "USA"
  }
}
